channel.title: Posts on Tryna Get Less Fat, Yo.
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tryna Get Less Fat, Yo.

item.title: Still Here
item.description: Lest ye fret: I’m still here, and still walking and biking (though not as consistently as I’d like). I’ve got a couple bike ride reports in the hopper. The walks are a lot less interesting than they were at first (lots of repitition). But they’re still happening. Happy stalking me!
item.content:
Lest ye fret: I’m still here, and still walking and biking (though not as consistently as I’d like). I’ve got a couple bike ride reports in the hopper. The walks are a lot less interesting than they were at first (lots of repitition). But they’re still happening.

Happy stalking me!

item.title: OOOH FANCY!
item.description: I modified the hello-friend-ng theme to include Fancy Zoom. It’ll mostly be useful on the route maps.
item.content: I modified the hello-friend-ng theme to include Fancy Zoom. It’ll mostly be useful on the route maps.

item.title: Trying Hugo and Netlify
item.description: Hosting my own images on my VPS is not sustainable. Hello Github+Netlify!
item.content: Hosting my own images on my VPS is not sustainable. Hello Github+Netlify!

item.title: Workouts
item.description: Just trying front matter on an _index.md file to see how that looks.
item.content: Just trying front matter on an _index.md file to see how that looks.

item.title: Gettin' Back Up on the Horse
item.description: It’s February 2020. Anyone with flimsy resolutions in January has probably already broken them. This is a good time for my ass to get back into a routine. My excuse through most of last year was that work was getting in the way; too many meetings before 9:00 a.m., and experience has shown that I have to do my gym shit in the morning, or not at all. And since the gym doesn’t open until 7:00, that meant not at all.
item.content:
It’s February 2020. Anyone with flimsy resolutions in January has probably already broken them. This is a good time for my ass to get back into a routine.

My excuse through most of last year was that work was getting in the way; too many meetings before 9:00 a.m., and experience has shown that I have to do my gym shit in the morning, or not at all. And since the gym doesn’t open until 7:00, that meant not at all.

Which was a cop-out.

Screw that. Work is not getting better, but I am getting worse. So no more meetings before 9:00 a.m. anymore. And therefore no excuse not to put in my time 3 days per week.
